inputs.selection_motivation: India Retail Inflation influences USD because inflationary pressures affect the Indian rupee’s valuation, which in turn impacts import costs and exchange rates.
inputs.candidate_motivation: These topics are the most plausible direct or close-influences on India Retail Inflation, spanning commodity pass-through, currency effects, and policy/trade shocks plus inflation indicators that commonly correlate with Indian inflation dynamics.

proposed_link.motivation: India Retail Inflation influences USD because inflationary pressures affect the Indian rupee’s valuation, which in turn impacts import costs and exchange rates.
